message: Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mStartTime' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.

Constant name not following naming convention - Name 'sAnimations' must match pattern '^[A-Z][A-Z0-9]*(_[A-Z0-9]+)*$'.
